body:
Comment 8: 
You're just using the package under two different import
paths (pkgpath). that's all. And theoretically this can also
happen with other (non-main) packages (directory hard-links,
for example).

when it's built as the main package for a command, its import
path (pkgpath) is main, otherwise the pkgpath is whatever import
path you used to import it.

It's consistent that pkgpath is always the package's import
path.
